game.name: Manivore
game.shortDescription: 그는 단순히 죽이기 위해 사냥하지 않는다. Manivore는 단순한 살인자가 아니라, 예술가다. 그에게 죽음은 결과가 아닌 과정이다. 이 뒤틀린 게임에서 진실을 밝혀낼 수 있을까, 아니면 다음 먹이가 될 것인가?
game.shortDescriptionEn: He doesn’t just hunt to kill. Manivore is not just a murderer, he is an artist. For him, death is not an outcome but a process. Can you uncover the truth within this twisted game, or will you be the next prey?

reviewHighlights.text: Having two achievements for two ending choices, but it being the same ending. Is the icing on the cake of a game with no redeemable qualities.
